item.title: Post PC OS Hate
item.description: Smartphones & Tablets are new plastic papers. Android and IOS dominates the market. I own Android Phone because its cheap. When it comes to Gadgets I am conservative. I really donâ€™t like Android much because its written in Java and need a better hardware to run Interpreted Languages, JS. Android runs from low end cheap 4000Rs phone to Nexus Phone. So wide variety of device headaches to developers. Every Android phone is one layer coated with device makers code, same with Linux distros.
